title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 145-1.1 - Applications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 145-1.1 - Applications

State Regulations

To be eligible to receive an academic performance award
under section
605
of the

Education Law, a candidate shall file in the department a formal application, in the form and at the time prescribed by the commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
145-1.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
